answers.answer: Congratulations on being Hep C Free! Enjoy, enjoy, enjoy
Congrats!what wonderful newsEnjoy your Hep Free life!
Congratulations! Another dradon slayed! Enjoy your life! Don't forget to post your results on Nan's SVR or Relapsed thread!
Have a great hep c free life !!!!
Celebration time! This is going to happen to many of you. Where there's hope, there's a solution, and Harvoni solved my problem, will solve many more....Magnum

This is such great news!!!  I'm seeing familiar names from my previous treatments and all of you are giving me such hope!  I have 18 days left of 24 months of Harvoni and Ribavirn, tx round 4.  I'm starting to really hope I may get the good news too!Enjoy your freedom from the dragon!   YAY!!!!
Thanks everyone, it sure is a great feeling.  I'll be thinking of you sue4hula...Harvoni seems to be working for a lot of us oldies!!!  :)
There are three of us on this page alone that have SVR with Harvoni...Wonderful news!
congratulations!  now step up onto the Dias and accept your Dragon .slayer Supreme Insignia!Welcome to your Hep C Free life!Pat

question: I haven't been here in some time, just needed to concentrate on me while I was on my 6th treatment with Harvoni and Riba.  I was a 3 time non responder with Interferon and Infergen, had a viral breakthrough with Incivek, relapsed with Sovaldi and SVR'd with Harvoni!  Been around the block with treatments.  Finally received that call we all wait for...congratulations, you are cured!I knew when I had relapsed on Sovaldi, 6 weeks post the muscle and joint pain returned with a vengeance.  Once that pain had lessened with Harvoni it never returned, I continued to feel better ~ I'd forgotten how good I felt once upon a time.  I am a genotype 1, forget whether a or b and don't really care now, Stage 4 Cirrhosis. Treated for 24 weeks with Riba thrown in at 5 weeks. During my years of being positive, I developed neuropathy and diabetes.  Hoping now that my liver may begin working a little better the diabetes will subside.  I'm not using as much insulin as before, so it's time to get serious,  eat a whole lot better and get myself back in order.  I am so ready to be me again.Hang in there friends!  Harvoni is really working especially for us difficult to treat peeps.  Treatment was easy, even with the Riba ~ I knew what that drug was all about!  I'm CURED, I'm HAPPY as a frog and I'm going to LIVE LIFE like never before.   :)
title: Finally ~ Another one bites the dust...
